TITLE: Fluxys Belgium, North Sea Port, ArcelorMittal Belgium And Federal Energy Minister Tinne Van Der Straeten Join Forces
SUMMARY: June 2 (Reuters) - FLUXYS BELGIUM NV <FLUX.BR>::NORTH SEA PORT, FLUXYS BELGIUM, ARCELORMITTAL BELGIUM AND FEDERAL ENERGY MINISTER TINNE VAN DER STRAETEN ARE JOINING FORCES TO DEVELOP A NETWORK OF PIPELINES FOR HYDROGEN, CO2 AND HEAT IN PORT AREA.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal Files For Mixed Shelf In The U.S., Size Undisclosed - SEC Filing
SUMMARY: May 12 (Reuters) - ArcelorMittal: :ARCELORMITTAL FILES FOR MIXED SHELF IN THE U.S., SIZE UNDISCLOSED - SEC FILING.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal Q1 Operating Income Up At 2.64 Bln
SUMMARY: May 6 (Reuters) - ARCELORMITTAL SA <MT.LU>::ARCELORMITTAL REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2021 RESULTS.Q1 SALES $16.2 BILLION.1Q 2021 OPERATING INCOME OF $2.6BN VERSUS. $2.0BN IN 4Q 2020.NET INCOME OF $2.3BN IN 1Q 2021 AS COMPARED TO NET INCOME OF $1.2BN AND ADJUSTED NET INCOME OF $0.2BN IN 4Q 2020.COMPANY DELIVERED $0.3BN OF FREE CASH FLOW AT END-Q1.COMPLETED A $650M SHARE BUYBACK IN 1Q 2021.Q1 SALES USD 16.19 BILLION VERSUS USD 14.84 BILLION YEAR AGO.Q1 CRUDE STEEL PRODUCTION 17.6 MT VERSUS 21.1 MT YEAR AGO.Q1 STEEL SHIPMENTS 16.5 MT VERSUS 19.5 MT YEAR AGO.Q1 OWN IRON ORE PRODUCTION 13.3 MT VERSUS 14.4 MT YEAR AGO.Q1 IRON ORE SHIPPED AT MARKET PRICE 9.8 MT VERSUS 8.6 MT YEAR AGO.Q1 COMPANY DELIVERED $0.3BN OF FREE CASH FLOW ($1.0BN NET CASH PROVIDED BY OPERATING ACTIVITIES LESS CAPEX OF $0.6BN LESS $0.1BN DIVIDENDS PAID TO MINORITIES) DESPITE A $1.6BN INVESTMENT IN WORKING CAPITAL, REFLECTING SEASONAL AS WELL AS MARKET FACTORS.COMPANY NOW EXPECTS APPARENT STEEL CONSUMPTION ("ASC") IN 2021 TO BE AT OR ABOVE UPPER END OF RANGES PRESENTED AT TIME OF 4Q 2021 RESULTS IN FEBRUARY 2021.EXPECTS GLOBAL APPARENT STEEL CONSUMPTION ("ASC") IN 2021 TO GROW BETWEEN +4.5% TO +5.5%.GROSS DEBT DECREASED BY $0.9 BLN TO $11.4 BLN AS OF MARCH 31, 2021, AS COMPARED TO $12.3 BLN AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2020 AND $13.8 BLN AS OF MARCH 31, 2020.

TITLE: Arcelormittal Plans Investment In German Sites To Accelerate Co2 Emissions Reduction Strategy
SUMMARY: March 29 (Reuters) - ARCELORMITTAL SA <MT.LU>::ARCELORMITTAL PLANS MAJOR INVESTMENT IN GERMAN SITES, TO ACCELERATE CO2 EMISSIONS REDUCTION STRATEGY AND LEVERAGE THE HYDROGEN GRID.OBJECTIVE IS TO REACH INDUSTRIAL COMMERCIAL MATURITY OF TECHNOLOGY BY 2025, INITIALLY PRODUCING 100,000 TONNES OF SPONGE IRON A YEAR.TECHNOLOGY CONVERSION REQUIRES INVESTMENTS IN RANGE OF EUR 1-1.5 BILLION AND WOULD RESULT IN PRODUCTION COSTS THAT ARE AROUND 60 PER CENT HIGHER, COMPARED WITH TODAY.UP TO 3.5 MLN TONNES OF STEEL COULD BE PRODUCED BY BREMEN AND EISENHUTTENSTADT SITES BY 2030, WITH SIGNIFICANTLY LOWER CO(2) EMISSIONS.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal Looking For Utility Partners, Subsidies For Green German Steel - Europe Chief
SUMMARY: March 26 (Reuters) - ArcelorMittal SA <MT.LU>::LOOKING FOR UTILITY PARTNERS, PUBLIC FUNDING TO TRANSFORM GERMAN STEEL OPERATIONS TOWARD CARBON NEUTRALITY - EUROPE CHIEF IN REUTERS INTERVIEW.EUROPE CHIEF - SWITCH TO DRI METHOD, MORE SCRAP METAL SMELTING IN BREMEN, EISENHUETTENSTADT WOULD COST 1-1.5 BILLION EUROS ($1.18-1.77 BILLION).EUROPE CHIEF - CHANGING TO LOW-CARBON OPERATIONS IN BOTH LOCATIONS HAS THE POTENTIAL TO SAVE 5 MILLION TONNES OF CO2 PER YEAR~.EUROPE CHIEF - DECISION TO GO AHEAD DEPENDS ON POSITIVE OUTCOME OF PUBLIC FUNDING APPLICATIONS, ALSO EU NEEDS TO PROTECT STEELMAKERS AGAINST CHEAP IMPORTS VIA BORDER CARBON TAX~.

TITLE: Air Liquide, ArcelorMittal Partner On Decarbonising Steel Production
SUMMARY: March 17 (Reuters) - L'Air Liquide Societe Anonyme pour l'Etude et l'Exploitation des Procedes George <AIRP.PA>::AIR LIQUIDE AND ARCELORMITTAL JOIN FORCES TO ACCELERATE THE DECARBONIZATION OF STEEL PRODUCTION IN THE BASIN OF DUNKIRK.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal Names Geert Van Poelvoorde As CEO Of ArcelorMittal Europe
SUMMARY: March 8 (Reuters) - ArcelorMittal SA <MT.LU>::ARCELORMITTAL NAMES GEERT VAN POELVOORDE AS CEO OF ARCELORMITTAL EUROPE.YVES KOEBERLE HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS CEO ARCELORMITTAL EUROPE – FLAT PRODUCTS.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal Q4 EBITDA Up At $1.72 Billion
SUMMARY: Feb 11 (Reuters) - ArcelorMittal SA <MT.LU>::Q4 OWN IRON ORE PRODUCTION 15.3 MT VERSUS 14.8 MT YEAR AGO.Q4 IRON ORE SHIPPED AT MARKET PRICE 10.6 MT VERSUS 9.6 MT YEAR AGO.Q4 REVENUE $14.18 BILLION VERSUS $15.51 BILLION YEAR AGO.Q4 EBITDA $ 1.72 BILLION VERSUS $ 0.93 BILLION YEAR AGO.Q4 NET INCOME GROUP SHARE $ 1.21 BILLION VERSUS LOSS OF $1.88 BILLION YEAR AGO.RECOVERY IN STEEL SHIPMENTS: RECOVERY IN APPARENT STEEL DEMAND (GROWTH OF +4.5% TO +5.5% IS CURRENTLY FORECAST IN 2021 VERSUS. 2020).STEEL SHIPMENTS ARE EXPECTED TO INCREASE YOY (ON A SCOPE ADJUSTED BASIS I.E. EXCLUDING THE IMPACTS OF THE ARCELORMITTAL USA SALE AND THE DECONSOLIDATION OF ARCELORMITTAL ITALIA12 (EXPECTED IN 1Q 2021)).COMPANY ENDED 2020 WITH GROSS DEBT OF $12.3 BILLION AND NET DEBT OF $6.4 BILLION.BOARD PROPOSES TO RESTART THE BASE DIVIDEND TO SHAREHOLDERS AT $0.30/SH TO BE PAID IN JUNE 2021.IN 2020 DELIVERED $1.5BN OF FREE CASH FLOW.TO RETURN $570 MILLION OF CAPITAL TO SHAREHOLDERS THROUGH A FURTHER SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAM IN 2021.INITIATIVES ARE UNDERWAY TO ENSURE THAT WE TAKE LESSONS FROM OUR SWIFT AND COMPREHENSIVE COVID-19 RESPONSE ACTIONS AND EMBED THESE ACROSS BUSINESS, WITH A TARGET OF DELIVERING MORE THAN $1 BILLION OF SUSTAINED SAVINGS BY 2022 - EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN.

TITLE: Aditya Mittal Appointed CEO Of ArcelorMittal
SUMMARY: Feb 11 (Reuters) - ArcelorMittal SA <MT.LU>::LAKSHMI N. MITTAL TO BECOME EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN; ADITYA MITTAL APPOINTED CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER.

TITLE: Arcelormittal To Sell Shares in Cleveland-Cliffs For $651.6 Million
SUMMARY: Feb 9 (Reuters) - ArcelorMittal SA <MT.LU>::ARCELORMITTAL ANNOUNCES SALE OF 40 MILLION COMMON SHARES IN CLEVELAND-CLIFFS FOR GROSS PROCEEDS OF $651.6 MILLION.PROCEEDS FROM SALE OF CLEVELAND-CLIFFS COMMON SHARES WILL BE USED FOR A NEW SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAMME OF ARCELORMITTAL COMMON SHARES.TRANSACTION IS A PART OF A COMBINED PRIMARY AND SECONDARY PUBLIC OFFERING OF CLEVELAND-CLIFFS' SHARES.

TITLE: EU to decide by July 9 on ArcelorMittal bid for Liberty Steel France
SUMMARY: European Union antitrust regulators will decide by July 9 whether to clear world No. 1 steelmaker ArcelorMittal's bid for two French steel plants belonging to Sanjeev Gupta's Liberty Steel, according to a European Commission filing.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal reports best start to a year for a decade
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaker, reported higher than expected first-quarter earnings on Thursday after what it said was its strongest quarter in a decade.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal beats estimates after "very positive" start to year
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaker, reported higher than expected first quarter earnings after what its chief executive said was a "very positive" start to the year.

TITLE: Exclusive-ArcelorMittal, Vattenfall form hydrogen consortium with Shell, Airbus, others
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's top steelmaker, and Swedish utility Vattenfall have teamed up with Shell, Airbus and other heavyweights to cut emissions in industrial processes by using hydrogen, two executives said.

TITLE: Ukraine says ArcelorMittal to invest $1 bln to cut pollution
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal will invest around $1 billion in upgrading its steel facilities in Ukraine to reduce pollution, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy was quoted as saying on Wednesday.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal looking for partners, subsidies for cleaner steelmaking in Germany
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal is looking for partners and public funding to curb carbon emissions from steelmaking in its German operations where alternative technology plans are far advanced, the European head of the world's biggest steel producer said.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal looking for partners, subsidies to "green" German steel
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal is looking for utility partners and public funding to curb carbon emissions from steelmaking in its German operations where alternative technology plans are far advanced, the European head of the world's biggest steel producer said.

TITLE: Steelmaker ArcelorMittal steps up carbon-neutral push
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal will offer green certificates to customers willing to pay a premium for low-carbon steel, it said on Wednesday as it also launched a fund to support breakthrough technologies to curb carbon emissions from steelmaking.

TITLE: Three bodies found after stack collapses at ArcelorMittal S.Africa steelworks
SUMMARY: The bodies of three workers were found overnight at ArcelorMittal South Africa's Vanderbijlpark Works, after the collapse of a coke battery stack at the steel plant the previous morning, the company said on Thursday.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal plans $1 billion cost cuts under new CEO
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaker, plans to cut 20% of its office staff in a $1 billion cost-reduction plan, it said on Thursday after posting higher than expected fourth-quarter earnings and boosting returns to shareholders.

TITLE: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-ArcelorMittal plans $1 bln cost savings, restarts dividend
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaker, unveiled a new $1 billion cost reduction plan and restarted dividend payments after higher than expected fourth-quarter earnings.

TITLE: CORRECTED-ArcelorMittal beats estimates, restarts dividend, names new CEO
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world’s largest steelmaker, reported higher than expected fourth quarter earnings and said current chief financial officer Aditya Mittal would become chief executive, replacing his father and founder Lakshmi Mittal.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal, Nippon Steel to build new electric arc furnace in U.S.
SUMMARY: Japan's Nippon Steel Corp and ArcelorMittal SA will spend $775 million to build an electric arc furnace at their U.S. joint venture in Alabama, with a planned start date in the first half of 2023, Nippon Steel said on Tuesday.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal beats profit expectations after lockdown low
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaker, reported third-quarter core profit above expectations on Thursday as the easing of COVID-19 lockdowns led to improved demand in all regions.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal profit beats expectations after lockdown easing
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal, the world's largest steelmaker, reported third-quarter core profit above expectations on Thursday as the easing of COVID-19 lockdowns led to improved demand in all regions.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal commits to becoming carbon neutral by 2050
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal <MT.LU>, the world's largest steelmaker, committed on Wednesday to being carbon neutral by 2050, although it said a level playing field with green border adjustments and abundant, affordable clean energy would be required to get there.

TITLE: ArcelorMittal South Africa to restart furnace on higher steel demand
SUMMARY: Steel producer ArcelorMittal South Africa <ACLJ.J> said on Tuesday it would restart the second blast furnace at its Vanderbijlpark operations in January due to higher steel demand.

TITLE: Cleveland-Cliffs to buy U.S. assets of ArcelorMittal
SUMMARY: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc <CLF.N>, the largest U.S. producer of iron ore pellets, has agreed to buy the U.S. assets of the world's largest steelmaker ArcelorMittal SA <MT.LU> for about $1.4 billion in cash and shares.

TITLE: Cleveland-Cliffs to buy U.S. assets of ArcelorMittal for about $1.4 bln
SUMMARY: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc, the largest U.S. producer of iron ore pellets, said on Monday it had agreed to buy U.S. assets of the world's largest steelmaker ArcelorMittal SA for about $1.4 billion. (Reporting by Rama Venkat in Bengaluru; Editing by Shounak Dasgupta)

TITLE: Exclusive: ArcelorMittal in talks to merge U.S. assets with Cleveland-Cliffs - sources
SUMMARY: ArcelorMittal SA, the world's largest steelmaker, is exploring a deal to merge its U.S. operations with Cleveland-Cliffs Inc, the largest U.S. producer of iron ore pellets, people familiar with the matter said on Sunday.
